Detailed Description

Superclass to all old searchrequestpackets.

The SearchRequestHeader lookes like this: {verbatim} SortingType 4 nbrMapIDs 4 mapID * nbrMapIDs 4 * <nbr_map_ids> nbrLocations 4 nbrMasks 4 nbrCategories 4 locationType 4 regionsInMatches 4 topRegion 4 sourceMask 1 zipCode string <mask> * nbrMasks 8 * <nbr_masks> <category> * nbrCategories 4 * <nbr_categories> <location> * nbrLocations strings <mask_name> * nbrMasks strings {verbatim}

Definition at line 127 of file SearchRequestPacket.h.

Parameters:

do a dns lookup of the IP. Can be very time consuming if the IP is invalid.

int OldSearchRequestPacket::readHeader (  SearchTypes::SearchSorting &  sortingType,
char *&  zipCode,
uint32 &  nbrLocations,

StringTable::countryCode &  topRegion,
vector< MC2BoundingBox > &  bboxes
)  const
 

Reads the header of the search request and sets the parameters.

Parameters:
sortingType the sortingType of the packet
zipCode the zipcode of the packet
maskNames is the names describing the masks.
dbMask A mask of the available databases.
regionsInMatches The search region types or:ed together that should be in the reply matches.
topRegion The top region to perform the search in. Only applies when making an overviewsearch in SearchRequest. The following params are allocated here and should be deleted by the caller. masks, maskItemIDs, categories, locations, maskNames

int OldSearchRequestPacket::writeHeader (  SearchTypes::SearchSorting  sortingType,
uint32  numMapID,
const uint32 *  mapID,
const char *  zipCode,
uint32  nbrLocations,
const char **  locations,
uint32  locationType,
uint32  nbrCategories,
const uint32 *  categories,
uint32  nbrMasks,
const uint32 *  masks,
const uint32 *  maskItemIDs,
const char **  maskNames,
uint8  dbMask,
uint32  regionsInMatches,
StringTable::countryCode  topRegion,
const vector< MC2BoundingBox > &  bboxes = vector< MC2BoundingBox >()
) 
 

Writes a search request header.

Parameters:
sortingType the type of sorting used to sort the hits.
numMapID the number of mapIDs
mapID a vector(!) of mapIDs
zipCode a particular zipcode or part of a zipcode or 0 if the zip code does not matter.
nbrLocations is the number of location string in locations.
locations is a vector with strings describing locations.
nbrCategories The number of categories.
categories The categories.
nbrMasks is the number of masks in masks.
masks is the vector with the masks limiting the search in the map. If nbrMasks is 0 masks may be NULL.
maskItemIDs is the itemIDs of the masks.
maskNames is the names describing the masks.
dbMask A mask of the allowed databases.
regionsInMatches The search region types or:ed together that should be in the reply matches.
topRegion The top region to perform the search in. Only applies when making an overviewsearch in SearchRequest.
